SettingsItem.Name: Biological matrix
SettingsItem.Description: The target biological matrix (internal compartment) for which the results are computed. Biological matrices from kinetic conversions will become available after selecting a data source in the kinetic models module.

SettingsItem.Name: Exposure sources
SettingsItem.Description: Specifies the exposure sources involved in the exposure assessment.

SettingsItem.Name: Individual reference set
SettingsItem.Description: Specifies the exposure sources used as reference set for matching individuals.

SettingsItem.Name: Standardised (creatinine) or normalised (specific grafity) urine concentrations
SettingsItem.Description: Standardised (creatinine) or normalised (specific grafity) urine concentrations.

SettingsItem.Name: Selected expression type
SettingsItem.Description: Standardised urine (creatinine) or normalised urine (specific grafity).

SettingsItem.Name: Population alignment method other non-dietary exposures
SettingsItem.Description: Population aligment methods for nondietary exposure sources.

SettingsItem.Name: Population alignment method (RSExpo) dust exposures
SettingsItem.Description: Population aligment methods for (RSExpo) dust exposure sources.

SettingsItem.Name: Population alignment method (RSExpo) soil exposures
SettingsItem.Description: Population aligment methods for (RSExpo) soil exposure sources.

SettingsItem.Name: Population alignment method (RSExpo) air exposures
SettingsItem.Description: Population aligment methods for (RSExpo) air exposure sources.

SettingsItem.Name: Population alignment method diet exposures
SettingsItem.Description: Population aligment methods for dietary exposure sources.

SettingsItem.Name: Match at random based on age
SettingsItem.Description: Air exposures are randomly matched on stratifying covariable age.

SettingsItem.Name: Match at random based on sex
SettingsItem.Description: Match at random based on stratifying cofactor sex.

SettingsItem.Name: Matching method for age
SettingsItem.Description: Match at random based on age using user defined bins (in years) or fit to closest available set of ages.

SettingsItem.Name: Specify bins:
SettingsItem.Description: Specify bins, e.g. 10 25 50 (space separated) in years.

SettingsItem.Name: Match at random based on age
SettingsItem.Description: Nondietary exposures are randomly matched on stratifying covariable age.

SettingsItem.Name: Match at random based on sex
SettingsItem.Description: Match at random based on stratifying cofactor sex.
